He has a built-in advantage, but it's a big state and it requires many days on the road to campaign successfully, he said. Jim Bopp, a Terre Haute attorney who also is a Republican National Committee member, said Mike Pence could be hard to beat if he runs for governor.

Sandman Cometh: It's become such a classic that Adam Sandler has updated it several times, with fresh examples of James Caan celebs swapped in for each new version.
